Content.Text:
<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey there, welcome to my restaurant.
<PAGE>
You're the new farmer in town, <MYNAME>,
right? I'm <BLUE>Raeger</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'm the owner and head chef here. Well...the
ONLY chef, actually. It's good to meet you.
<PAGE>
I might be biased, but I can totally vouch for the
quality of the food. Nothing re-energizes a tired
body like my meals.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Talk to me at the counter any time during
business hours and I'll be glad to show you the
menu.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey there, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>This is my restaurant. It's the first time you've
stopped by, right?
<PAGE>
I might be biased, but I can totally vouch for the
quality of the food. Nothing re-energizes a tired
body like my meals.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Talk to me at the counter any time during
business hours and I'll be glad to show you the
menu.
